titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2614), to amend the Small Business Investment Act to make improvements to the certified development company program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-1007, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2614 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Waives points of order against the conference report and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 321.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 652.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 195 (Roll no. 555).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 200 (Roll no. 556).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/26/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2614 (certified development company program revisions).
